metadata.title: CVE-2024-5690 on Ubuntu Pro FIPS 18.04 LTS (bionic) - medium
metadata.description: By monitoring the time certain operations take, an attacker could haveguessed which external protocol handlers were functional on a user'ssystem. This vulnerability affects Firefox < 127, Firefox ESR < 115.12, andThunderbird < 115.12.

criterions.comment: mozjs38: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
mozjs52: while related to the CVE in some way, a decision has been made to ignore this issue.
